《疯狂英语2003合集全部文本》（一） ... ) brotherhood n. 兄弟情谊 ) intone v. （以拖长的声音）吟咏 ) solitude n. 孤独.
咏的组词_百度知道 ... 咏怀[ sing of one's feelings] 咏叹[ intone;sing;chant] 咏叹调[ aria].

list.abs: ...说地道的英语，整个句子的节奏感很关键，这其中包含：升调(rising intonation); 降调(falling intonation); 重读(stress); 连读（lin.
intonation 语调intonation pattern 语调模式intoxication 中毒
...含：升调(rising intonation); 降调(falling intonation); 重读(stress); 连读（linking sound）。
纯律(just intonation)的构成基础是几个具有简单频率比的音程:纯五度,纯律大、小三度,纯律大、小六度等.由此人们便产生一种天然想象.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (originally as entone): from Old French entoner or medieval Latin intonare, from in- 'into' + Latin tonus 'tone'

entry.tran: 缓慢庄重地说;(以单一的音调)吟咏，吟诵
entry.def: If you intone something, you say it in a slow and serious way, with most of the words at one pitch.

example.tran: 他肃穆地轻声念了几句祈祷词。

example.ex: 'But Jesus is here!' the priest intoned.
example.tran: “但是耶稣在这里！”牧师吟诵道。

means.word_mean: 1. utter monotonously and repetitively and rhythmically;

sentences.sentence: "The students chanted the same slogan over and over again"

means.word_mean: 2. recite with musical intonation; recite as a chant or a psalm;
3. speak carefully, as with rising and falling pitch or in a particular tone;

auth_sentence.content: The men...intone in a single unison with a rich accompaniment.
auth_sentence.res_content: The men...intone in a single unison with a rich accompaniment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The men...intone in a single unison with a rich accompaniment.

auth_sentence.content: "We only said 'potential' disaster," they piously intone. No, God looks at the heart and one day all secrets will be revealed.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: "We only said 'potential' disaster," they piously intone. No, God looks at the heart and one day all secrets will be revealed.

auth_sentence.content: Despite all of the births, last night's Mad Men continued to intone the death of something.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Despite all of the births, last night's Mad Men continued to intone the death of something.
